changes.change: Added libcolorpicker as a dependency for real this time
Added the ability to change all the other modules and cc background
Fixed the border showing around the module title while expanded
Partially fixed the live listen module (still have to remove the background)
CC Background is now independent from the other settings
Added remove or keep button/module backgrounds (also independent from other settings)
Fixed an issue in ios 11 where the mediaplayer background stayed
Live listen still needs fixed (I really hate this module !!)
1.0.6-1: Changed settings around to better explain things
Fixed effects not being applied to the WiFi toggle for Chinese users
